changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS users_seq START WITH 1000

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, surname VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, creation_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, deleting_time TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id) )

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS rate_seq START WITH 1000

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rate ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, number_of_evaluations INT NOT NULL, one INT NOT NULL, two INT NOT NULL, three INT NOT NULL, four INT NOT NULL, five INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) )

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS question_seq START WITH 1000

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS question ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, is_deleted BOOL NOT NULL, text VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, answer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, rate_id BIGINT, creator_id BIGINT, creation_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, deleting_time TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (rate_id) REFERENCES rate(id), FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES users(id) )
